parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Instanciate a [[Side]] center. A [[Side]] center is required to be able to [[createGroup|create groups]] of this side.<br>
Centers can only be created for [[east]], [[west]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]] and [[sideLogic]] [[Side|sides]].<br>
Created sides must have their "side-friendship" defined with [[setFriend]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> In <template><title>arma</title></template> and <template><title>arma2</title></template>, only [[Mission.sqm]]'s units side centers are created; e.g if no [[resistance]] unit has been placed in the editor you must use [[createCenter]] before being able to create a [[resistance]] group.</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3 </title><part><name index="1"/><value> In Arma 3, centers for all sides are all created by the engine.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[createCenter]] side </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[createCenter]] [[east]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[deleteCenter]], [[createUnit]], [[createGroup]], [[createVehicle]], [[side]], [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
